item.title: 随着美国立法的成形，稳定币在企业中的地位日益提高
item.description: 随着被称为《GENIUS 法案》的美国稳定币法案在参议院取得进展，加密货币行业的一个曾经的小众角落正迅速获得全球企业的青睐。【原文：As the U.S. stablecoin bill, known as the GENIUS Act, advances in the Senate, a once-niche corner of the crypto industry is gaining rapid traction among global corporates.】

item.title: 独家报道：联合利华提议彼得-特尔-库尔夫出任上市冰淇淋部门首席执行官
item.description: 联合利华周二表示，已提议将其即将上市的冰淇淋业务交由彼得-特尔-库尔夫（Peter ter Kulve）领导，本-杰瑞公司董事会曾在诉讼中指责彼得-特尔-库尔夫 "令人瞠目 "的无知以及对其社会目标政策的篡改。【原文：Unilever said on Tuesday that it has proposed its soon-to-be listed ice cream business will be led by Peter ter Kulve, whom the Ben & Jerry's board has accused in lawsuits of "eye-popping" ignorance and muzzling its social purpose policies.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯称 "更真实地 "希望进入窄体飞机市场
item.description: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司首席执行官图凡-埃尔金比勒奇（Tufan Erginbilgic）周二表示，这家英国喷气发动机制造商希望进入窄体飞机市场，最好是通过合作的方式。【原文：Rolls-Royce CEO Tufan Erginbilgic said on Tuesday it was "even more true" that the British jet engine maker would like to enter the narrowbody plane market, preferably through a partnership.】

item.title: 数据显示，《GTA VI》延期影响全球电子游戏市场增长
item.description: 据路透社周二独家报道，研究公司 Newzoo 的一份报告显示，2025 年全球电子游戏市场的增长率预计将比上一年略有提高。【原文：The global videogame market's growth rate is expected to improve marginally in 2025 from the previous year, according to a report from research firm Newzoo, seen exclusively by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Adobe 为手机带来人工智能图像生成应用程序，并增加了合作伙伴
item.description: Adobe 公司周二发布了首款专用人工智能智能手机应用程序，其中包括来自该公司及其合作伙伴公司的人工智能模型，旨在利用在社交媒体上分享人工智能图像和视频这一日益增长的趋势。【原文：Adobe Inc. released its first dedicated artificial intelligence smartphone app on Tuesday that includes AI models from the company and partner firms, in a bid to tap into a growing trend of sharing AI images and videos over social media.】

item.title: 数据中心需求保持强劲，苹果供应商捷普上调年度预期
item.description: 电子元件制造商捷普周二上调了全年利润和收入预期，押注于数据中心强劲的基础设施服务需求。【原文：Electronics component maker Jabil raised full-year profit and revenue forecast on Tuesday, betting on strong infrastructure services demand for data centers.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司称稀土供应问题导致库存增加
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司首席执行官卡琳-拉德斯特罗姆（Karin Radstrom）周二在哥德堡举行的一次会议后告诉记者，中国关键原材料的供应障碍已促使卡车制造商戴姆勒卡车公司在短期内增加库存。【原文：Obstacles to the supply of key raw materials from China have prompted truckmaker Daimler Truck to increase its inventories in the short term, CEO Karin Radstrom told reporters after a conference in Gothenburg on Tuesday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司与越南航空公司达成协议，航展上结束关税的希望升温
item.description: 在周二举行的巴黎航展上，空中客车公司与廉价航空公司 VietJet 就多达 150 架单通道喷气机达成了协议，美国运输部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）在航展上为业界恢复免关税贸易的希望打了一支强心针。【原文：Airbus struck a deal with budget airline VietJet for up to 150 single-aisle jets at the Paris Airshow on Tuesday, where industry hopes of a return to tariff-free trade were given a boost by U.S. Transport Secretary Sean Duffy.】

item.title: 美国 5 月零售额大幅下降
item.description: 美国 5 月份零售额降幅超过预期，受机动车购买量下降拖累，原因是人们急于打消与关税相关的潜在涨价预期，但消费者支出仍受到工资稳健增长的支撑。【原文：U.S. retail sales dropped more than expected in May, weighed down by a decline in motor vehicle purchases as a rush to beat potential tariffs-related price hikes ebbed, but consumer spending remained supported by solid wage growth.】

item.title: 数据分析初创公司 Coralogix 在最新一轮融资中将估值翻倍，超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 数据分析平台 Coralogix 的联合创始人兼首席执行官阿里尔-阿萨拉夫（Ariel Assaraf）在接受路透社采访时表示，随着人工智能驱动的企业产品不断引起投资者的兴趣，该公司在最新一轮融资中的估值几乎翻了一番，超过了 10 亿美元。【原文：Data analytics platform Coralogix nearly doubled its valuation to over $1 billion in its latest funding round, co-founder and CEO Ariel Assaraf told Reuters in an interview, as artificial intelligence-driven enterprise offerings continue to pique investor delight.】

item.title: 日产推出新聆风，重振电动汽车雄风
item.description: 自 2010 年首款聆风电动车进入展厅以来，日产已从大众市场的电动车先锋沦为落后者。【原文：Nissan is betting on a new version of its Leaf electric vehicle (EV) to revive its fortunes, having gone from mass-market EV pioneer to laggard since its first model entered showrooms in 2010.】

item.title: 肯德基母公司百胜餐饮集团财务总监克里斯-特纳将接任首席执行官一职
item.description: 百胜餐饮集团周二任命其财务总监克里斯-特纳（Chris Turner）为首席执行官，接替将于明年退休的公司资深人士大卫-吉布斯（David Gibbs）。【原文：Yum Brands on Tuesday named its finance chief Chris Turner as its CEO, succeeding company veteran David Gibbs, who is retiring next year.】

item.title: 意大利莱昂纳多公司收购欧洲网络安全公司
item.description: 意大利莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo）董事长周二告诉路透社，该公司将很快宣布收购一家欧洲网络安全公司。【原文：Italy's Leonardo will soon announce the acquisition of a European cybersecurity company, its chairman told Reuters on Tuesday, as the aerospace and defence group consolidates a business seen as increasingly important in new combat systems.】

item.title: 早间竞标：中东战火纷飞，石油受控
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 甲骨文云将在面向企业客户的产品阵容中增加 xAI 的 Grok 3 模型
item.description: 甲骨文公司周二表示，其云计算部门正在与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能公司xAI合作，向企业客户提供该公司最新的人工智能模型。【原文：Oracle said on Tuesday that its cloud computing division is working with Elon Musk's artificial intelligence firm xAI to offer the startup's latest AI model to business customers.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏将停止推出含有人工色素的新产品
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周二表示，从即日起将不会在美国推出含有人工色素的产品，并将致力于在 2027 年底之前淘汰现有产品中的合成染料。【原文：Kraft Heinz said on Tuesday it would not launch products with artificial colors in the United States effective immediately, and would aim to eliminate synthetic dyes from existing items by the end of 2027.】

item.title: 参议院提议在 2028 年前逐步取消税收抵免后，太阳能股票下跌
item.description: 周二，美国太阳能股票在盘前交易中下跌，原因是参议院一个小组提议到2028年全面取消太阳能和风能税收抵免，这是对唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面减税和支出法案提出的修改建议的一部分。【原文：U.S. solar stocks dropped in premarket trading on Tuesday after a Senate panel proposed a full phase-out of solar and wind energy tax credits by 2028, as part of changes suggested to President Donald Trump's sweeping tax-cut and spending bill.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，由于需求疲软，法拉利将第二款电动车型至少推迟到 2028 年推出
item.description: 两位接近法拉利的消息人士告诉路透社，由于高性能豪华电动车需求不足，法拉利已将原定于2026年推出的第二款全电动车型的计划推迟到至少2028年。【原文：Ferrari has delayed plans for its second fully-electric model that was due out in 2026 to at least 2028, because of a lack of demand for high-performance luxury EVs, two sources close to the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 中东冲突持续，华尔街期货走低
item.description: 周二，随着中东冲突进入第五天，美国股指期货走低，在美联储即将召开政策会议之前，全球投资者信心受挫。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Tuesday as conflict in the Middle East entered its fifth day, dampening global investor confidence ahead of the Federal Reserve's upcoming policy meeting.】

item.title: 中国江淮汽车将扩大使用华为智能汽车解决方案，包括辅助驾驶功能
item.description: 中国江淮汽车集团周二表示，将扩大华为智能汽车技术的使用范围，包括在其车型中使用辅助驾驶和智能驾驶舱。【原文：China's JAC Group said on Tuesday that it will expand the use of Huawei smart car technology, including assisted driving and smart cockpits in its models under a deal signed with the tech conglomerate.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险上升，关税影响不明，美联储决策者齐聚一堂
item.description: 美联储决策者将于周二开始为期两天的会议，中东紧张局势升级有可能引发新的大宗商品价格冲击，而新的美国数据预计将显示 5 月份零售销售额下降，工厂产出疲软。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers will begin a two-day meeting on Tuesday with escalating tensions in the Middle East risking a new commodity price shock and fresh U.S. data expected to show a drop in retail sales and sluggish factory output in May.】

item.title: 瑞士皮克泰银行前雇员因洗钱被判刑
item.description: 瑞士总检察长办公室周二表示，瑞士皮克泰银行（Pictet Bank）一名前理财经理因洗钱被判处六个月监禁，缓期执行，并处以罚款。【原文：The Swiss Attorney General's Office has handed a former wealth manager at Pictet Bank a six-month suspended prison sentence and fined the private bank for money laundering, the government said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯顾问称以伊冲突将刺激俄中天然气交易
item.description: 一家为俄罗斯政府提供对华咨询的智囊团负责人告诉路透社，中东日益紧张的局势将加速俄罗斯与中国之间的天然气谈判，双方很可能在今年做出决定。【原文：Rising tensions in the Middle East will accelerate natural gas negotiations between Russia and China, with a decision likely this year, the head of a think-tank that advises the Russian government on China told Reuters.】

item.title: 高盛：中国新建住宅需求仍远低于 2017 年峰值
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周一晚些时候表示，未来几年中国的新房需求可能仍将大幅低于 2017 年的市场峰值，这一预测表明世界第二大经济体面临着长期的房地产低迷。【原文：Demand for new homes in China is likely to remain substantially below the market's 2017 peak over the next few years, Goldman Sachs said late on Monday in a projection suggesting that the world's second-biggest economy faces a long property slump.】

item.title: 特朗普说他可能会再次延长 TikTok 的最后期限
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，他可能会延长中国字节跳动剥离短视频应用 TikTok 美国资产的最后期限。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he would likely extend a deadline for China-based ByteDance to divest the U.S. assets of short video app TikTok.】

item.title: 花旗银行认为 2025 年第三季度后黄金将跌破 3000 美元，原因是需求疲软、经济增长不容乐观
item.description: 花旗银行在周一的一份报告中称，受投资需求下降和全球经济增长前景改善的影响，该行下调了黄金的短期和长期价格目标，预计到2025年底或2026年初，黄金价格可能会跌破每盎司3000美元。【原文：Citi lowered its short-term and long-term price targets for gold, projecting prices could drop below $3,000 per ounce by late 2025 or early 2026, driven by declining investment demand and an improving global growth outlook, the bank said in a note dated Monday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司与越南航空公司达成购买多达 150 架飞机的协议
item.description: 空中客车公司周二达成协议，将向越南廉价航空公司 VietJet 出售多达 150 架单通道飞机，这家欧洲飞机制造商继续在巴黎航展上大展拳脚。【原文：Airbus struck a deal on Tuesday to sell up to 150 single-aisle aircraft to Vietnamese budget airline VietJet , as the European planemaker continues to rack up business at the Paris Airshow.】

item.title: 中国希望猪更苗条
item.description: 中国农民和小型企业越来越多地从大型饲养者那里购买适销对路的生猪并将其育肥，以赌求更高的价格，但政府正在打击这种投机行为，以减少生猪数量，稳定市场。【原文：Chinese farmers and small firms have increasingly bought market-ready pigs from larger breeders and fattened them in a bet on higher prices, but the government is cracking down on the speculative practice to slim down hogs and stabilise the market.】

item.title: 德国防务初创企业赫尔辛在最新一轮投资中募集到 6 亿欧元资金
item.description: 德国防务初创公司赫尔辛（Helsing）周二表示，该公司在最新一轮投资中筹集了6亿欧元（约合6.933亿美元），领投方为Spotify创始人丹尼尔-艾克（Daniel Ek）。【原文：German defence start-up Helsing has raised 600 million euros ($693.30 million) in its latest investment round, lead by Spotify founder Daniel Ek, the firm said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 韩国贸易代表预计与美国的会谈将在未来几周蓄势待发
item.description: 首尔最高谈判代表周二表示，韩国将在未来几周内加紧努力，在与美国的谈判中达成一项贸易协议，此前韩国国内的政治动荡阻碍了其关税谈判的进展。【原文：South Korea will step up efforts to secure a trade deal in negotiations with the United States in the next few weeks, Seoul's top negotiator said on Tuesday, after political turmoil at home had dampened its progress in tariff talks.】
